summary: An Ordinance accepting the joint bid of the First Trust & Savings Bank, Merchants Loan & Trust Company and A. B. Leach & Company, all of Chicago, Illinois, for bonds in the sum of Five Hundred Thousand ($500,000.00) Dollars of the bonds in the sum of Eight Hundred Thousand ($800,000.00) Dollars, authorized to be issued by the special election held in The City of Seattle on the 29th day of December, 1908, for the purpose of enlarging and extending the Municipal Lighting Plat, construct and acquired pursuant to the provisions of Ordinance No. 7708, Ordinance No. 11461 and Ordinance No. 13242.
